title: Integrated Methodology Design Based on Ecological Dynamics for High-Performance Team Sports Organizations

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Sports Science Theory, Team Sport Strategy Design Experience, and Understanding of Self-Regulated Learning Concepts
context.additional_context: Students engage in practice-centered collaborative learning using real-time video conferencing tools and personal devices, receiving immediate feedback on learning outcomes through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the design principles of team sport training tasks by applying ecological dynamics theory
From the learner's perspective (as a self-regulated performer), learners can analyze constraint conditions in competitive environments and design training programs
Collaborate with an interdisciplinary team (coaching staff, sports scientists) to design personalized training programs

resources: Team sports video materials for case analysis

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
